group.name: Pinewood Intelligence Team
group.description:
This is a Unofficial Pinewood Intelligence Team (P.I.T).

Welcome to The Pinewood Intelligence Team! What we do is that we study about the pinewood computer core and figure out the 3rd code! Figuring out the 3rd code is hard but we can still research. 

This team is also kinda related to the Pinewood Intelligence Agency but more different, this team is below the Agency team.

The Pinewood Intelligence Team accepts people that are in the Pinewood Builders group. Now don‚Äôt get upset now because you can get in those groups free! 

NOTE: This group is highly maintained only with Pinewood Builders. Other groups not acceptable.

group.name: The Resistance Of Knights
-SCPF | Special Containment Procedures Foundation-
group.description:
"We Secure. We Contain. We Protect."
‚ñ†‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ†
The SCP Foundation is a government entrusted organisation tasked with safeguarding the world from anomalous entities and their abnormal talents.
The foundation is run by a group of highly knowledgeable people tasked with overseeing a department and ensuring the high professionalism of the Foundation.
"We die in the dark, so the rest of humanity can thrive in the light."
‚ñ†‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ†

You can join our communications server by clicking the first icon located in Social Links (top right corner)!
To achieve a higher rank join our communications server and apply or go to our Application Center.

Foundation established by BlookyL on the 17th of March, 2019.

group.name: PBST: Door Regiment
group.description:
Welcome to the Pinewood Builders Security Team: Door Regiment!
We must protect the core from raiders, meltdowners and other menaces. However, you must not forget that wherever you go, our lord DOOR is watching over you. Protecting you. Caring for you. DOOR will give us strength, DOOR will give us freedom, DOOR will give us our true selves.

Only the most dedicated worshippers will be allowed to see DOOR in it's true form, and be taken to heaven to live alongside DOOR as one of it's most trusted disciples.

 
"Door never said that the journey would be easy, but Door did say that the arrival would be worthwhile"

-----------------------------------------------------------------
You must follow all of the PBST handbook rules here at PBSTDR. Which means that you MUST go OFF-DUTY while while patrolling at Pinewood Facilities.

**This group is being archived, meaning it will not be revived or used anymore, just left as is.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------

shout.body: @everyone, i'm hosting a special training at 18:30 pm utc! At https://web.roblox.com/games/4633523577/PBST-Door-Regiment-Training-Facility ! If you wan't to come, STS in line.

group.name: Pinewood Builders Furry Team
group.description:
Hello! Welcome to Pinewood Builders Furry Team!

We are just a social group made up of furries in Pinewood Builders. Feel free to come chat with us on our communications server, we do not bite! We accept everyone into our group (even if you're not a furry!).

We aren't a regiment.

shout.body: Re-branding of the group has been put in place. We have replaced all of the regiment-style ranks and features. We are just a social group now.

group.name: Quack Corporation
group.description:
üåü Welcome to Quack Corp! üåü

Quack Corp is both a studio group and a development community, previously known as Voidblox. This is a place where everyone can share positive thoughts and have discussions, development-related or not. Inexperienced or troubled developers can seek the advice they desire through our community to improve themselves + the community as a whole.
 
The group wall is the second-best place to communicate about development or Quack Corp games. Check the social links tab for better communication methods!

Quack Corp developers:
Csdi - Main developer and game creator
spyagent388 - Helper and assist
a8y - Background ambience sound design
(Please note that those in developer ranks are not actual Quack Corp developers. The only QC developers are the couple listed above)
 
Founded on 4/30/17 by Csdi

shout.body: New blocks added to House Interior, Space Kit, and Landscape! Big updates are coming real soon

group.name: Quantum Science Inc.
group.description:
Quantum Science Inc. was founded in 2014 by two friends aspiring to re-pioneer the science community. Since 2019, we have made great strides in expanding our barriers, our best innovation being the Dark Matter Reactor. We pride ourselves on being the best, no matter what obstacles stand in our way. 

Our motto; "Let's Create, Together." 

Active Facilities: 
‚Ä¢ Quantum Science Energy Research Facility 

Facilities Under Construction: 
‚Ä¢ J. National Laboratory
‚Ä¢ M. Nuclear Generation Station

shout.body: QSERF will be undergoing temporary maintenance as we hope to fix many problems with the game, as well as release Phase 2 of our update. Please standby.

group.name: [PET] Hazmat Team
group.description:
Join this group to show you're in the PET hazmat team on your nametag at PBCC!

Official subsidiary group of Pinewood Emergency Team.

- We access high toxicity and nuclear environments and perform tasks or research required.

- We develop technologies that can withstand extreme environments that are hard to survive.

- We rescue those in need and where access requires specialist suits.

shout.body: Visit the PBDSF to see when upcoming trainings are being hosted: https://www.roblox.com/games/1428153850/Pinewood-Builders-Data-Storage-Facility?refPageId=039caa00-e1b0-4bba-9019-5df8f5f82c66

group.name: [PET] Fire Team
group.description:
Join this group to show you're in the PET fire team on your nametag at PBCC!

From small train fires, to huge nuke emergencies, the PET Fire Team is always striving to make the Pinewood Computer Core a safe place to be! The fire team is trained in firefighting exercises, tactics and approaches when it comes to fighting huge fires and evacuating citizens. Patrols and trainings are hosted every week!

Official subsidiary group of Pinewood Emergency Team.

group.name: Pinewood Builders Security Team: 1st Company
group.description:
Welcome to the First Company.

We are an unofficial regiment of the Pinewood Builders Security Team, and provide training that is more focused on helping the individual improve. The First Company's main focus is on protecting Pinewood facilities against organized attacks. Make sure to join the First Company Communications server by clicking the icon above this description to the right.

Fear no evil!

shout.body:
Training begins in 20 minutes at PBST:1C Training Zone.
Link of the TZ: https://www.roblox.com/games/3323784196/PBST-1C-Training-Zone

group.name: Mega Miners
group.description:
A group for Mega Miners, a subsidiary group of Pinewood Builders: handling the mining, construction, heavy industries and valuable resource extraction sector of Pinewood Builders. 

Drive big machines and trains, load up cargo, dig through solid rock! 

We make use of varying size haul trucks, cargo trains with specialist carriages, mining drills, saws and equipment, wheel loaders and bulldozers, bucket-wheel excavators as well as various other machines and techniques for mining and construction work. 

We take discussion and suggestions here. 

Wear the official uniform with hi-vis jacket which can be found in the Pinewood Builders group store! (See affiliates)

 See affiliates for other official Pinewood Builders subgroups. 

‚ñ†‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ† 

Play Mega Miners: www.roblox.com/Mega-Miner-place?id=17541179

group.name: Pinewood Builders Aerospace
group.description:
All members are welcome. 

The aerospace division of Pinewood Builders, combined with our space division, shuttle, aircraft and military flight as well as astronaut centrifuge training at our research facility.

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

Pinewood has been researching and developing Roblox aerospace since 2008, where the original Pinewood Labs facility had a dedicated aircraft hangar developing Roblox classic planes. Today we break the boundaries of precision high speed flight and space travel, providing technology like nothing else pioneered before.

One of our notable projects was the 05/28/2012 Space Shuttle Advantage, which was featured in the blog multiple times, BLOXcon and as an advertisement of the power Roblox has in creation.

shout.body: Buckle up in your moon rockets! Today is the 1969 50th Anniversary of the moon landings!

group.name: The Mayhem Syndicate
group.description:
Welcome to the Mayhem Syndicate, we unite as brothers in arms and cause chaos to large groups and militaries all across Robloxia. Using high tech weapons and alien technology, we bend those who oppose us to our will.

We primarily celebrate destruction as the Pinewood Computer Core raid group, where we attack the core and don‚Äôt let PBST get in our way.

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

üëâFor promotions and information please read the TMS Handbook here: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/the-mayhem-syndicate-handbook/595758

Glory to the syndicate.

Training times are in UTC.

group.name: Pinewood Builders Media
group.description:
Pinewood Builders Media
‚Ä¢The official news and movie provider of Pinewood‚Ä¢

‚ñ†‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ†
Pinewood Builders Media is a subsidiary of Pinewood Builders and was founded on the 8th of April 2018. PBM will serve as the new media and news hub for Pinewood Builders, taking over from any past media groups.

Create cool videos for Pinewood! Want to host a news show? A YouTube video with a funny montage at a Pinewood facility? Create music? This is the place to do it! You can earn a promotion from doing any of these to a respective rank. Create whatever you want!

YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkbQ3b2zN7_u1VNL7TfoydQ

The official studio is on floor 9 of PBHQ.

‚ñ†‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ†

shout.body: New hoodies in the group store!

group.name: Pinewood Builders Quality Assurance
group.description:
Welcome to Pinewood Builders Quality Assurance!

We're a group of testers that ensure that new and existing development has as little bugs as possible and works as intended. Join us today to become the first to test Pinewood game mechanics.

Most of our testing is announced via the social media links.

group.name: Pinewood Builders Security Team
group.description:
PBST is the private paramilitary force of Pinewood Builders. PBST protects the facilities, staff, and other assets of Pinewood Builders- a group that develops military weapons, space technology, and other things that push the limit of Roblox. 

We band together as a team, together we are an unstoppable force.

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨
Please wear your PBST uniform while on duty. The standard uniform as well as unique variations of it can be found in the group store.

[Keep the core temperature safe at all times]

Patrol any Pinewood facility when possible and keep it safe.

Handbook: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/pinewood-builders-security-team-handbook-11-10-2019/385368/2

Training times all use UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) / PRT (Pinewood Reference Time) = UTC

shout.body: I will be hosting a Training at 9:00 PM UTC, (1 Hour from now). Attend here at: https://www.roblox.com/games/1564828419/PBST-Activity-Center

group.name: Pinewood Emergency Team
group.description:
An elite team of the best rescue heroes and firefighters responding to emergencies all over Roblox and the world!

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

group.name: Pinewood Builders
group.description:
Welcome, be part of our ever growing community and experience our huge interactive games! 

Play Pinewood Computer Core where you're in control of the reactor and survive a multitude of disasters; launch into space with Space Shuttle Advantage and explore the cosmos; dig deep into the earth at Mega Miners and drive huge vehicles as well as many other cool games we've made! 

Being in this group gives you extra perks at our games too!

üëâClick the Teleport Hub to warp to our games.

Browse our store for uniforms and clothing.

Pinewood Builders was founded on May 15th 2008, and is worldwide.

group.name: XYLEM Technologies
group.description:
Projects and tasks in this group are handled by Lenemar and Diddleshot.

üå± XYLEM Technologies is a team of more advanced developers that help to create items and systems for games like Pinewood Computer Core.

üëâ Who's In? 
    Invitations are given to those who the XYLEM Facilitator sees fit in developing for the group. The group is invitation only and much like the PIA group, chances of joining may decrease if you ask to join. 

üí° Concepts created by XYLEM Technologies:
> Advanced forklift at Pinewood Computer Core
> Cool explosion effects (Meltdown)
> PET tools and suits
> Replication technology (specifically used for cloning Lenemar).

    Imagination is what fuels this group as we make what seems to be impossible a reality.

shout.body: Apples are good
